name: Sub 13 (LOREZJAM Entry)
description:
Take control of Sub 13 to save the idiotic scientists. Lucky they wore their wetsuits.

CONTROLS:

Dual analog stick

Left stick - MOVE

Right stick - FIRE

Save the scientists in wet suits. They're the ones waving.

Kill (mostly) everything else. Not everything harms you. In fact, some things are beneficial to you. THEN you can kill them.

Rocks crashing down on you? Time it.

Use the look-ahead-camera-view to your advantage ;)

NOTE: The EXTRA life option in the UPGRADES SHOP isn't enabled. Sorry. You'll just have to get better at the game then eh :)
